name: Organic
description:
Organic is a leading marketing agency that helps global brands accurately predict outcomes, spot trends, identify behaviors, and create a much deeper connection with consumers. Founded in 1993, Organic has offices in New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Detroit and London and is part of Omnicom Group Inc.
Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) is a leading marketing communication company that provides services to over 5,000 clients in more than 100 countries.
